newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria unemployment rises to 11.1 pct in Oct.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria unemployment rises to 11.1 pct in Oct.

text.p: The number of people unemployed in Bulgaria rose to 425,419 or 11.1 percent of the workforce in October from 401,634 in September, the National Labour Exchange (NLE) said.

"The number of unemployed registered (with the NLE) rose 5.9 percent month-on-month in October due to a fall in the number of seasonal jobs and an inflow of people from closed state firms and young men, who have completed military service," a NLE official told Reuters.
The seasonal decline in the number of jobs mostly affected farming, forestry and and housing construction.
The Socialist government has slated 64 loss-making state firms for liquidation under a funding agreement with the International Monetary Fund sealed in July.
